Welcome to Belle Hall

Order online from the
BELLE HALL location
Dry January, Done Right 
Our Dry January Menu is officially here, featuring refreshing zero-proof cocktails crafted with the same care and creativity you expect from Dog & Duck. All the flavor, none of the alcohol. Whether you‚Äôre going dry for the month or just trying something new, stop by and enjoy one of our zero-proof favorites. .
Available January 1-31, 2026, only 
Cheers to good taste and great company.

We‚Äôre Local and We‚Äôre All About Our Neighbors!

From sponsoring school sports and scholastics to hosting fundraisers for local charities, the Dog & Duck family gets involved in our community!
Learn More About Our Community Initiatives A great neighborhood eatery, for dine-in or takeout. Reasonable prices, good beers and a fun atmosphere to enjoy good food and company. Chris Always excellent food and service!! Ordered to go over 15 times since I‚Äôve lived in Mt. Pleasant, and everything I‚Äôm impressed and satisfied. Definitely a place to go to if you want some good food! Michael This was my first time trying this place and lord knows I really enjoyed it. The wings are phenomenal and the customer service was beyond amazing! I highly recommend this place ‚ù§Ô∏è Lakia Delicious food, Great Service and friendly atmosphere. Traditional gastropub food served was very fresh and yummy. I recommend the wings and fish n chips. Justin Great pub style, friendly restaurant. Highly recommend for a ‚Äòcheersie‚Äô good time!! Marika Had Roast Beef au jus and meat was a nice med with a bit of pink, real tender. We went on Friday night so place was jamming. We found a seat outside which was perfect. We‚Äôll definitely be back!!! GB Good friendly service and fun atmosphere great vibes and great food Will definitely recommend this place to all groups of people Elliot Tasty hot dog. The ‚ÄúDon Knotts‚Äù Chili, Slaw and I added some diced onions. Piping hot fries. Service was super! Shawn Cozy local feel, great food! Lots of beverage choices for all. As busy as it was, our service was great! Darren A great neighborhood eatery, for dine-in or takeout. Reasonable prices, good beers and a fun atmosphere to enjoy good food and company. Chris Always excellent food and service!! Ordered to go over 15 times since I‚Äôve lived in Mt. Pleasant, and everything I‚Äôm impressed and satisfied. Definitely a place to go to if you want some good food! Michael This was my first time trying this place and lord knows I really enjoyed it. The wings are phenomenal and the customer service was beyond amazing! I highly recommend this place ‚ù§Ô∏è Lakia Delicious food, Great Service and friendly atmosphere. Traditional gastropub food served was very fresh and yummy. I recommend the wings and fish n chips. Justin Great pub style, friendly restaurant. Highly recommend for a ‚Äòcheersie‚Äô good time!! Marika Had Roast Beef au jus and meat was a nice med with a bit of pink, real tender. We went on Friday night so place was jamming. We found a seat outside which was perfect. We‚Äôll definitely be back!!! GB Good friendly service and fun atmosphere great vibes and great food Will definitely recommend this place to all groups of people Elliot Tasty hot dog. The ‚ÄúDon Knotts‚Äù Chili, Slaw and I added some diced onions. Piping hot fries. Service was super! Shawn Cozy local feel, great food! Lots of beverage choices for all. As busy as it was, our service was great! Darren

Oyster Roasts 
Oyster Buckets $19

Starting @ 5PM (until they are gone)
